instances.excerpt: Evidence shows that women invest their earnings in their children’s health and education, improving their own children’s prospects while expanding the human capital in their countries.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Our article in Agrilinks profiles Deepa Poudel, a smallholder farmer from Nepal who has emerged as a key figure in her community, addressing the challenges posed by climate change.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Check out the 40th-anniversary edition of our global annual report which looks back on 2022, highlighting a handful of impressive entrepreneurs who are changing their communities, a 40-year timeline, our financials, and the partners who made it possible.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Support from donors and foundations funds our efforts to directly address the parts of peoples’ lives that matter—we’re looking for what works, and you can help .

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Subsistence farmers don’t usually produce enough food to sell or trade. iDE helps them by leveraging technologies, supply chains, and market ecosystems to increase both agricultural productivity and economic returns.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Every day, more than 700 children under 5 die from diarrhea, contracted as they lack clean water. We believe changes around personal hygiene and defecation can be achieved by using the market to drive affordable solutions.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: By focusing on women as customers and entrepreneurs, iDE strengthens their participation in rural value chains and increases their access to technology, know-how, finance, and markets.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: iDE helps people in rural areas build their resilience to climate extremes through the use of water saving and climate-smart agricultural technologies and practice.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: We have boots on the ground in ten countries on three continents, and our teams live in the provinces, districts, and villages where we work.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Since 1984, iDE has helped expand incomes and improve lives in Bangladesh.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Our social enterprise, Sama Sama, is leading research into fecal sludge management in rural Africa.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height
instances.excerpt: Mozambique farmers are building resilience to climate changes with new technologies and strategies.

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height

instances.what: Paragraphs of text have sufficient line height

Check either there is no non-repeated content after repeated content or there exists an element for which all the following are true: - the element has semantic role inheriting from landmark; and - the first perceivable content (in tree order in the flat tree) which is an inclusive descendant of the element is non-repeated content after repeated content; and - the element is included in the accessibility tree.

Check either there is no non-repeated content after repeated content or there exists an element for which all the following are true: - the element is non-repeated content after repeated content; and - the element has a semantic role of heading; and - the element is visible; and - the element is included in the accessibility tree.

For each block of repeated content in each test target, which is before (in the flat tree) at least one node of non-repeated content after repeated content, check that all the following are true: - there exists an instrument to make all nodes in this block not visible; and - there exists an instrument to remove all nodes in this block from the accessibility tree.

Check if the page has any instrument(s) to move focus. Check if any of these instrument(s) is being used before a block of repeated content, and the focus is moved to just before a block of non-repeated content.
